meanings.definition: To make an effort to achieve or obtain something.
meanings.sent1: She restrives to finish her homework before dinner.
meanings.sent2: The students restrive to improve their grades each semester.
meanings.sent3: He restrives to reach the cookie jar on the top shelf.
meanings.sent4: Like a determined ant, she restrives to carry the heavy leaf back to the nest.
meanings.sent5: The little engine that could restrives up the steep hill.

meanings.sent1: After failing the first time, he restrives to pass the test.
meanings.sent2: The athlete restrives to beat his personal record in the next race.
meanings.sent3: The plant restrives to grow back after being pruned.
meanings.sent4: Just like a phoenix, she restrives from the ashes of defeat.
meanings.sent5: The determined squirrel restrives to find its hidden acorn stash.

meanings.definition: To work towards a goal with determination.
meanings.sent1: They restrive to save money for their dream vacation.
meanings.sent2: The team restrives to win the championship title this season.
meanings.sent3: The little girl restrives to reach the top of the jungle gym.
meanings.sent4: With unwavering focus, she restrives towards her career aspirations.
meanings.sent5: The marathon runner restrives towards the finish line with all his might.
